description:
River is a 25 year old stud who probably wouldn't wear any clothes at all if he were given the choice. He has an incredible body and is not shy to show it off.
He is a handyman and when he's not working on odd jobs around town, you can find him in the gym working on his muscular physique. But now, we bring him to you as he works on one muscle in particular and we think you'll like it. You can tell that River likes to show off, and we think you'll like to watch him do his thing.
River enjoys himself in 3 scenes-- the study, the kitchen, and the bedroom. Try not to drool.
title: River
